items.label: Prototype tool:
items.text: Real-time sync between Excel and web using Node.js/Express backend with MongoDB â€” enables collaborative budget editing across platforms

items.label: Data source:
items.text: Live Excel data synced bidirectionally; captured as screenshots for the formatted Budget Book view

items.label: How to use:
items.text: Excel add-in auto-syncs your spreadsheet to the web. Click 'Update Budget Book' to capture formatted screenshots. Perfect for creating polished budget presentations from raw Excel data.

items.label: Example:
items.text: Inspired bya live OpenGov Budget Book from Birmingham
